title: How to Make Marshmallow Dream Bars

steps.headline: Melt 3 Hershey's bars and 3 chocolate Gelt.
Fit the dish with medium marshmallows
Let cool until the chocolate is settle..

text: Prepare the chocolates.  Melt 3 Hershey's bars and 3 chocolate Gelt.  Put in a "4"x"7" baking dish.  Fit the dish with medium marshmallows  Put it in the microwave.  Decorate with sprinkles.  Let cool until the chocolate is settle..  Cut into 8 mini squares.  Finished.
